Class JedisUtils

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.utils.JedisUtils
public final class JedisUtils extends Object
A collection of utilities for Redis connections.
Author:
Greg Haines, Animesh Kumar

  • Method Details

    • ensureJedisConnection

      public static boolean ensureJedisConnection(Jedis jedis)
      Ensure that the given connection is established.
      Parameters:
      jedis - a connection to Redis
      Returns:
      true if the supplied connection was already connected

    • testJedisConnection

      public static boolean testJedisConnection(Jedis jedis)
      Test if a connection is valid.
      Parameters:
      jedis - a connection to Redis
      Returns:
      true if the supplied connection is connected

    • reconnect

      public static boolean reconnect(Jedis jedis, int reconAttempts, long reconnectSleepTime)
      Attempt to reconnect to Redis.
      Parameters:
      jedis - the connection to Redis
      reconAttempts - number of times to attempt to reconnect before giving up
      reconnectSleepTime - time in milliseconds to wait between attempts
      Returns:
      true if reconnection was successful

    • isRegularQueue

      public static boolean isRegularQueue(Jedis jedis, String key)
      Determines if the queue identified by the given key is a regular queue.
      Parameters:
      jedis - connection to Redis
      key - the key that identifies a queue
      Returns:
      true if the key identifies a regular queue, false otherwise

    • isDelayedQueue

      public static boolean isDelayedQueue(JedisCommands jedis, String key)
      Determines if the queue identified by the given key is a delayed queue.
      Parameters:
      jedis - connection to Redis
      key - the key that identifies a queue
      Returns:
      true if the key identifies a delayed queue, false otherwise

    • isRecurringQueue

      public static boolean isRecurringQueue(JedisCommands jedis, String queueKey, String hashKey)

    • isKeyUsed

      public static boolean isKeyUsed(JedisCommands jedis, String key)
      Determines if the queue identified by the given key is used.
      Parameters:
      jedis - connection to Redis
      key - the key that identifies a queue
      Returns:
      true if the key is used, false otherwise

    • canUseAsDelayedQueue

      public static boolean canUseAsDelayedQueue(JedisCommands jedis, String key)
      Determines if the queue identified by the given key can be used as a delayed queue.
      Parameters:
      jedis - connection to Redis
      key - the key that identifies a queue
      Returns:
      true if the key already is a delayed queue or is not currently used, false otherwise

    • canUseAsRecurringQueue

      public static boolean canUseAsRecurringQueue(JedisCommands jedis, String queueKey, String hashKey)
